review_data.content:
Amazing service.
The staff was very friendly and treated us wonderfully. They even respect Gluten intolerance, which I also thought was nice.

The prices are reasonable and really not that expensive. The Burgers were all I could ask for.
If you’re looking for a quick lunch go there for sure.

Bacon and cheese burger good. I particularly liked the meat which was well cooked and juicy. The bacon was good, even though I would have preferred it more crunchy. While the onions didn't convinced me completely, they didn't seem caramelized. The French fries, instead, were really good and tasty.
Good burger (i had the goat cheese burger),  however the meat was a bit hard.   Very dark inside. Beware, they don't serve actual Coca-Cola, but will bring "a" coke that is terrible and without gas.

Cozy burger place in the heart of Bern with very interesting burger options beyond meat :) I had the grilled veggie burger, and it was amazing how delicate, juicy and tasty the veggies were! The pickled onion added a beautiful punch too. We had a green salad which was refreshing and full of flavor… and together with the homemade fries, the perfect side dishes. I will come back. Highly recommended!

Great burgers, you can really taste every ingredient. Some might say the price is a bit steep compared to the quantity but in my opinion it is well worth it when the quality is this high. The staff was also very polite

Very disappointing burger and service.  When ordering we had to tell our server multiple times that we wanted only two single order of fries not the large option meant for three people.  I understand the concept of upselling but he really didn’t want to let us order what we wanted.  When the burgers arrived they were assembled so carelessly that it was difficult to eat and soggy. Some burgers were cooked medium and some were cooked rare.  Mine happened to be rare and as I was pregnant I needed mine to be cooked slightly more.  After waiting 10 minutes for a server to appear I ended up walking with it to the restaurant (we were eating outside)  and waiting for someone to appear.  When they didn’t I ended up
Walking it into the kitchen itself to get someone to help me.  When the burger came out again it was slathered in mayo not bbq as it was originally and again very careless assembled.  For the price this place isn’t with it.  You’d be better off at a Burger King or macdonalds.

Burgers are not bad but already pricey.
Came for lunch and asked for the “burger-fries-drink”, explicitly asking what drink are included.
When I came back to pay, I had to pay the full price of separated items (almost 29.-) instead of 22.-, just because I did not explicitly called for a “LUNCH DEAL”. What a joke. And they could not change it.
They had juicy burgers and a great selection of local beers, which I highly recommend you order if they’re not from Bern.

I ordered a take away and my order was a cheeseburger with fries.  The hamburger bread came wet as if it had been thawed and fell apart, the meat only tasted like pepper and the french fries were toasted

The Restaurant had a nice looking interior. When we had sat down the waiter seemed a bit overwhelmed and took the drink orders a bit chaotically, but we were in a very large group and i had the impression he hadn't worked there very long yet so it didn't bother me much. Since we were a large group we had given our burger orders in advance, so i don't know about regular waiting times but we had our burgers very quickly. The problem with that was that many people got their drinks when they had already eaten most of their burgers. But other than that, the service was great and the staff was incredibly friendly. I had a bacon and cheese burger, which i enjoyed a lot. The sauce, tasted great, and there wasn't to much or too little. The buns tasted great, and the patty was very juicy with a great taste. The burger overall was top notch, not a typical fast food burger. My girlfriend had a vegetarian burger which she really enjoyed too. The fries were great too, but a lot of it is down tto personal taste since the potatoes are cut into rather large pieces and the skin is left on (which is how i like fries most). They were also all nice and crunchy. The only problem i had with the fries is that i don't like the fake newspaper as container gimmick, but that is easily overlooked. You get lots of ketchup packets at your table so you won't run out, and i would recommend everyone to try their homemade mayo. I had a homemade hibiscus ice tea, which tasted great, and wasn't very sweet, so it was probably quite healthy too. The prices are great for what you get, especially if you have the students discount. If you are looking for a place for a great burger, i'd recommend the Butcher.

Very comfortable restaurant with friendly and fast staff. The food is excellent and the fries are crunchy! Definitely worth it
What you see was in total 53.70.-

Okay-ish place for a burger and fries. Staff is friendly but a little stressed out during crowded times though. The burgers are okay but far from awesome. Portions are on the bigger side, especially the side dishes. The fries are good!

The Hamburger, the fries and all food I tried was very good. 3 stars only because the service was superslow however the restaurant was empty, and they even forgotten about some things, and on top the staff was quite unfriendly.
Friendly staffs. Good burger and very crispy fries! Fair prices.
Good food for a honest price, fast delivery at the table and very nice atmosphere.

6pm, terrace half-full but the helpful & friendly server (Gabriel) was constantly busy and not sleeping on the job!  He clearly and simply explained Covid contact tracing rules, which is very important at the moment, but isn’t a “given” in all bars.

Good range of alcohol-free beer which is a rarity 👌

Try the food next time, it’s very good in Zurich.
Kinda expensive and the burgers weren't that good: the cheese wasn't melted, the meat was strangely hard. Should have go to Williams ButchersTable or the good guys instead but they were fully booked.
The only good thing about this place is the friendly stuff. Burgers no taste, fries very soft and homemade ice tea too sugery. & way too expensive for the quality
Great Burger, in beautiful restaurant. Fresh and tasty burgers for any preference. Would recommend.
Tasty burgers with golden buns :)
The burgers and the fries are good but too pricey for the quantity
Good service, average burger.
Great Burger. Good quality meat, simple and very tasty!
We got veggie and chicken burgers to go for our Bern to Zurich train. Burgers were delicious. Loved it.
Burgers so nice but chips not great
really good burgers and fries in a pleasant atmosphere with great service and affordable prices.
The best burgers here in bern!
A good hamburger. To try the pulled pork hamburger. The fries are also well done and tasty. The price of the hamburger that doesn't include the fries it's slightly high

• Great Burgers
• Nice Staff
• Even some vegan options

And I especially liked the environmentally friendly packaging.

All-around great experience.
I mean, little feel of expensive but it's fine, it has this industry vibes. We've liked it.
Friendly service and great food. Nice menu and relatively healthy.  I really enjoyed my meal!
Service was awesome! Friendly staff and great ambience. The fries was the best! :)

Various and good burgers.
The fries are also very good

We have tried it for the first time at summer time and went again with the same expectations, but it was a total disappointment. Menu had been changed and the burger wasn't the same at all.
So do not trust this high ranking you see in Google or elsewhere.
It is NOT the same juicy burger anymore. Instead, you will get a blunt and plain burger with almost to taste. Even good fries couldn't compensate to the bad burger.

Very nice atmosphere and tasty food. Price is a bit on the high side but it is still worth it. I went there two times now and one time we had to wait pretty long for our burgers. But I don't think it is usually like this. The first time it didn't take this long. Also, the staff is very welcoming and friendly.
I've had one of the most amazing pulled pork burgers there! Highly recommend.
Great burgers delivered by great bike couriers!

Nice burgers and decent veggie options even. The only thing I did NOT like were the disposable cups. Yeah, they do it in North America (I'm Canadian) but please keep the nicer aspects of Europe and use reusable dishes. The fries are awesome! They taste like spicy curly fries (but better).
Great food and very friendly personnel!

The best burger I have had all over the world. I went here three times in a week since it was so good. Cant wait to go back to Bern to get another burger. Get the fries as well.

Update 10/17/2019: New chef from when I went 6 months ago. Nothing like it used to be unfortunately. I was very excited to go yesterday and learned about the chef change. I would not recommend this burger anymore

Nice new(ish?) burger place in town. Took beef cheese burger with gluten free bread. Best gluten free bun I've had, love buckwheat. Really good burger too, great cheese mix, tasted something like Gruyere in there too. The bio elderflower lemonade was nice too but came with a plastic straw. 🤔 Overall nice experience, will try other stuff there too.
Good service and great burgers

Burger was OK, they forgot our bacon and brought it out after, still got charged for there mistake and also ordered 3 small beers and they brought big ones which we told them still charged us for them.  Three of us had a bacon cheeseburger (bacon added after) 1 small chips and a Mexican poutine (which was really good) and it was £100! A lot of money for not the greatest food and being charged for servers mistake is wrong.

Very good hamburgers with lots of options for everyone (vegan, gluten free, etc). Very high quality meat and other ingredients. Would be difficult to find a better burger place in Bern. They deliver and have an option to pre-order as well.
The meat was fantastic! Staff are friendly!
Awesome Burger Place. Good Beer (Chopfab) on draft. Nice choice of burgers. You can have your own style. Carnivores or herbivores, both are welcome and are likely to find something pleasant.

My workmates brought me to The Butcher for lunch. I had no clue what type of restaurant it was. However friendly service, properly structured menue card and my friends'advice helped selecting the right burger. The taste was good. Not mind blowing but good. The speed for serving the dishes needs some improvement but other than that all good.

Super nice place and the burgers are fantastic!!! The do offer also glutein-free burgers and seasonal burgers.

What I really like at this place is the friendly staff. They seem to be happy and you can really feel this!

I will come back for sure!
Good beer and burger, friendly service!

Average burgers. Meat quality was good, but the burger itself didn't really stand up. They used raw cucumber instead of pickled and it doesn't have the same kick. Coleslaw was just bad and absurdly overprice. Expensive for want you get, and they charged you for tap water (and while this is common in Bern, there are still restaurants that will give tap water for free, better to patron those)

The burgers are good! The place is welcoming and looks nice. The staff were erally sweet and went the extra step just for us. Overall it was a very good experience. The prices for a Burger, fries and a drink are about 30frs but they have offers for lunch and the do small portions and vegi portions so there something for everyone!

I came for a bier and Burger into a half-empty restaurant, left after almost an hour, seeing only a bier. Bier was good and there was a great smell coming from a kitchen. I hope  next time I will be luckier and will have a chance to taste the burger as well.

As burgers in Bern go, this is one of the least disappointing, thanks to a patty that's actually cooked medium, recipes that do include cheese (it's scary how many restaurants in the area find it acceptable to offer only cheeseless burgers), and good fries with a great choice of dips.
Thanks to the current offer of two free extras, this makes it a comparatively pretty good deal.
I only wish the cheese was actually tasty (even the goat cheese isn't up there) and they had more harmonious base toppings.

Of course a place called "The Butcher" has meat as the main ingredient of its proposals ("Feel the meat" is the motto). However, here you can even find suitable options for vegans. Vegan dishes (burgers or falafel, both also available as vegetarians for those who don't want to miss diary in their plate) have great taste, lots of calories and quite expensive prices (but that's normal for an expensive city like Bern, where everything costs a lot - especially food). Nice taste also for drinks, both beer and bio sparkling sodas. A welcoming staff and a good locations, complete a the positive experience.

Love: Amazing burgers, love that they have the FKK option as I prefer to sacrifice the buns for a larger portion of their amazing Butcher's fries.

Can be improved: It seems quite random how good your fries turn out to be that day. Sometimes they were perfectly seasoned throughout and the crispness was right. Some other times they weren't very well-seasoned, not to mention overly oil which showed that the kitchen was kinda busy to focus on the fries. Good service and portion (I hate burgers that give me mouth cramps when I eat). A tad pricey (Old town of Bern, can't help) but the food quality and service is worth it.

HUGE improvement needed: It's stated that the restaurant focuses on sustainability, but how come almost all the drinks are served in those plastic cups (except beer which are already inside glass bottles) regardless of whether or not it is a sit-in or a take-away? I'll try to ask for my drinks to be contained in a normal glass as it's painful to sip normal water contained in a plastic cup using a plastic straw in a restaurant. C'mon guys you are much better than this.
Simple, trendy, decent price compaired to most places, good food, casual and relaxed atmosphere. Well recommended to all
Juicy,perfectly medium burgers! Great ambiance too! Their fries and dips could be better, but I'm happy with just the burgers and beer anyway

Raphaela was an angel. I passed through Bern so quickly i only had time for one meal and a drink. She made sure it was all prepared in record time so i could catch my next train. Also the food was Delicious! Thank you
The three bois that are there every week: always a good time!

Nice new(ish?) burger place in town. Took beef cheese burger with gluten free bread. Best gluten free bun I've had, love buckwheat. Really good burger too, great cheese mix, tasted something like Gruyere in there too. The bio elderflower lemonade was nice too but came with a plastic straw. 🤔 Overall nice experience, will try other stuff there too.

Good looking place! Lots of people!
The burgers are not on my level of expectation!
Maybe not on my taste! Still a great place to visit!
One of the best vegan burgers i've ever tried
Very good vegetarian option! Even vegan. Their burgers have multiple flavours and get along very well.

We have tried it for the first time at summer time and went again with the same expectations, but it was a total disappointment. Menu had been changed and the burger wasn't the same at all.
So do not trust this high ranking you see in Google or elsewhere.
It is NOT the same juicy burger anymore. Instead, you will get a blunt and plain burger with almost to taste. Even good fries couldn't compensate to the bad burger.

Great place.

The burger was delicious and the fries fresh.

I also enjoyed a nice pint of beer which was more that good for the price and the location.

However friendly service, properly structured menue card and my friends'advice helped selecting the right burger. The taste was good. Not mind blowing but good. The speed for serving the dishes needs some improvement but other than that all good.

So far we had great experience, however, today it took ages to get the food (can live with that), but after mentioning that the meat was undercooked, they started to argue rather just to ‘correct’ it.
If you want eat a best burger in Bern you need go to this place, they'll present you a full menu with so many options of gourmets burger

Yummy!!!! is all I can say and they deliver!, I finally don't need to make my own burgers at home.
Thank you guys!
Cheers
Burger was kind of little, not a lot of sauce and expensive. Fries where good
Great burgers, tasty french fries, friendly staff,very clean restaurant and good prices!!
It was great that they offered a gluten free bun as an option. Burger was delicious!
The best burger in town !
Nice place, great burgers, very nice personnel, and prices in line with the standard in town.
Nice place, good service decent food, but for the price I payed I expected something more special!
One of the best vegan burgers i've ever tried
Good burgers (taste and size), in comparision a little pricey thou
CHF 60 for two simple burgers, fries and drinks is way too expensive !!
The best
Respected gluten intolerance and delivered great burgers. Delicious and juicy!
I've tried cheese burgur here, and the meat was not cooked. Also the taste was bad!
Excellebt food - slow service - it took them forever to bring the bill... bring some time and good company to shorten waiting time!
Good burgers and decent side dishes (highlight to the fries). Also has veggie options.
Burgerlicious. Ignore the naysayers, best Burger in the gastronomic black hole of Bern. Ta$ty flavour flavour flav.
Great place for drinks and Burger. Delicous food and friendly staff.
Friendly service, good meal - a bit pricey and what disappointed me was that Ketchup is free but Mayonnaise cost 1chf80..
excellent taste. i had a burger + fries and an iced tea.
Really good burger and the staff is just amizing.
The meal was perfect :)
Pricy but delicious
Delicious Burgers and sides!! Friendliy service!👍 Nice ambiance!!
Good vegetarian/vegan options but the service is mixed and the prices are high
Good service nice burger but sides are extra
Good burgers, friendly staff. Fork and knife would be a plus however
Lecket
Very nice place, good atmosphere. Met friends there and staff really friendly and helpful.
Great food and service +++++
Very friendly service, nice atmosphere, great burgers.
Good but pricey
Great burgers and nice place
Bland and boring tasting burgers and fries, simply can‘t recommend the place.
Really good burgers, excellent service
Greatest Hugo!
moderately occupied around lunch, basically no wait. and, that pulled pork burger  - gosh -  it was amazing.
This is my favorite place for a great burger.
The crips and the burgers are very delicious!
Nice service, good food, what more do you want?
Good burger and fries for a quick bit
OK place. The food is very oily and the decor looks outdated.
Delicious burgers. Great service 👍👍
Great hamburgers, great bread and great service
The Best Hamburger i eat in my Life...👌❤
really cool place with great food loved it
Good Cheesburger, great french fries!
Good food, good atmosphere, central.

Great food in a friendly atmosphere
Burger vegan very good !
Very nice food many peoples
Good burgers and good fries!
Loved it. Great food

Good vegetarian burgers and friendly staff :)

(Translated by Google) The online reservation was very easy and quick. We then had to change the time by phone, this went without any problems. Very pleasant restaurant visit, nice feel-good atmosphere, very courteous, attentive and friendly service and, above all, very tasty, juicy burgers with a good price-performance ratio. I will definitely visit this restaurant again and recommend it to others.

(Original)
Die Online-Reservierung war sehr einfach und schnell. Wir mussten dann doch den Zeitpunkt telefonisch ändern, dies ging problemlos. Sehr angenehmer Restaurantbesuch, schönes Wohlfühl-Ambiente, sehr zuvorkommender, aufmerksamer und freundlicher Service und vor allem sehr leckere, saftige Burger mit einem guten Preis-Leistungsverhältnis. Ich werde dieses Restaurant auf jeden Fall wieder besuchen und empfehle es weiter.

(Translated by Google) Burgers were quite good. Service friendly, you can easily pay yourself using a barcode. Very good for separate payers

(Original)
Burger waren ganz gut. Bedienung freundlich, man kann über ein Barcode ganz einfach selber zahlen. Sehr gut für getrennte Zahler

(Translated by Google) Super great burger of the no classic bacon and cheese
Highly recommended!
Very sympathetic staff
I'd love to come back.
Keep it up

(Original)
Super toller Burger der No classic Bacon and Cheese
Sehr empfehlenswert!
Sehr sympatisches Personal
Komme gerne wieder.
Weiter So

(Translated by Google) Great restaurant, great atmosphere. Would recommend to anyone, understanding management staff and world class burgers

(Original)
Super Restaurant, super ambiente. Ich würde es jeden weiterempfehlen, verständnisvolles führungs personal und weltklasse Burger

(Translated by Google) Unfortunately not the same as a few years ago. Burger meat was rather tough and tasteless, the Cheese Buger's cheese was barely melted, the sauce wasn't big and the bread was dry. For the price of 17 CHF it is definitely not worth the visit.
You can even enjoy it more at Mc Donalds.
However, the service was very friendly and the atmosphere pleasant.

(Original)
Leider nicht mehr dasselbe wie vor ein paar Jahren. Burgerfleisch wahr eher zäh und geschmacklos, der Käse des Cheese Bugers kaum geschmolzen, die Sauce nicht gross vorhanden und das Brot trocken. Für den Preis von 17 CHF lohnt sich der Besuch definitiv nicht.
Da kommt man sogar bei Mc Donalds mehr zum Genuss.
Bedienung war allerdings sehr freundlich und das Ambiente angenehm.

(Translated by Google) We ate there about three weeks ago. The burger and fries were ok. However, we were no longer noticed after the meal, although we stayed there for about 1.5 hours. We were only able to get hold of another drink after several attempts to order. In addition, we witnessed several violent arguments between the manager and the employees during our stay. There were also very misogynist statements from the manager. These incidents greatly spoiled the otherwise very pleasant atmosphere and I don't know if we will visit a place with such values ​​again.

(Original)
Wir waren vor etwa drei Wochen dort essen. Der Burger und die Pommes waren ok. Jedoch wurden wir nach dem essen nicht mehr beachtet, obwohl wir uns noch etwa 1.5 Stunden dort aufhielten. Ein weiteres Getränk konnten wir uns erst nach mehreren Bestellversuchen ergattern. Ausserdem bekamen wir während unserem Aufenthalt mehrere heftige Auseinandersetzungen zwischen der Führungsperson und den Angestellten mit. Dabei kam es auch zu sehr frauenfeindlichen Aussagen von Seite der Führungsperson. Diese Vorfälle trübten das ansonsten sehr angenehme Ambiente sehr und ich weis nicht, ob wir ein Lokal mit solchen Wertvorstellungen nochmal besuchen werden.

(Translated by Google) Cosy, good music. That's it, the burgers are really bad, first one came out wrong and as a result didn't go through well. Not at all suitable for children, for example, since there are no children's menus. Have fun.

(Original)
Gemütlich, gute Musik. Das wars die Burger sind echt schlecht, zu erst kam einer falsch und als Folge nicht gut durch. Für Kinder beispiel auch gar nicht geeignet, da es keine Kinder Menus gibt. Wünsche viel spass.

(Translated by Google) The food came after a short time, the meat was very tasty and the burger tasted great! Really think this restaurant is one of the best in Bern!

(Original)
Das Essen kam schon nach kurzer Zeit, das Fleisch war sehr lecker und der Burger schmeckte toll! Finde dieses Restaurant wirklich eines der Besten in Bern!

(Translated by Google) Unfortunately not really a good burger. The service is friendly, but the decor is careless and the meat is of poor quality. You'll definitely find better in the city.

(Original)
Leider echt kein guter Burger. Die Bedienung ist freundlich, aber die Einrichtung lieblos und das Fleisch von geringer Qualität. Da findest du in der Stadt definitiv Besseres.

(Translated by Google) Burgers were bland no toasty flavors like the meat was oven made. Barbecue wasn't even tasted.
When told that we hadn't received our sauces, the waiter replied "Really?" Took a long time before they noticed us so we could order the bill and another few minutes before we got it. Gastrointestinal pain incl. Once and never again. Restaurant is called The Butcher but has more vegetarian options than meat

(Original)
Burger waren fade keine Röstaromen als wäre das Fleisch im Ofen gemacht. Barbecue wurde nicht einmal herausgeschmeckt.
Auf den Hinweis dass wir unsere Saucen nicht erhalten haben erwiderte die Bedienung "Wirklich?" Dauerte lange bis sie auf uns aufmerksam wurden damit wir die Rechnung bestellen konnten und nochmals weitere Minuten bis wir sie dann erhielten. Magen Darmschmerzen inkl. Einmal und nie wieder. Restaurant heisst The Butcher hat aber mehr Vegieangebot als Fleisch

(Translated by Google) I always go with my colleague. It's delicious and the service is very personable! The vegetarian burgers with the fries are just awesome. I have to say that it's a bit expensive, but I think it's definitely worth it :)

(Original)
Ich gehe immer wieder mal in Begleitung mit meiner Kollegin. Ist mega lecker und der Service sehr sympathisch! Die vegetarischen Burger mit den Pommes sind einfach genial. Muss aber schon sagen, dass es ein bisschen teuer ist, aber ich finde es lohnt sich auf jeden Fall:)

(Translated by Google) Traveled all the way from Germany because I had heard so many good things. Was it worth it? The best burgers I've had in a long time :)

(Original)
Extra aus Deutschland angereist, weil ich so viel gutes gehört hatte. Hat dich gelohnt! Die besten Burger die ich seit langem hatte :)

(Translated by Google) The bad experiences are incomprehensible to me. The price for quality food and great ambience is justified. The waitress was very dedicated and did a great job. Gladly again!

(Original)
Die schlechten Erfahrungen sind für mich nicht nachvollziehbar. Der Preis für qualitativ gutes Essen und tolles Ambiente ist gerechtfertigt. Die Bedienung war sehr engagiert und hat einen tollen Job gemacht. Gerne wieder!

(Translated by Google) Very good food with really nice service (especially the one with the long hair was very friendly and took our special requests into account). Recommended!

(Original)
Sehr gutes essen mit echt netter Bedienung (speziell der mit den langen haaren war sehr freundlich und hat unsere Spezialwünsche gut beachtet). Empfehlenswert!

(Translated by Google) Thank you thank you thank you. Was there with my boyfriend on his birthday and we were served very kindly and courteously by everyone. The burgers were great and simply tasted. Always my pleasure!! 👍🏻👍🏻

(Original)
Danke Danke Danke. War mit meinem Freund da als er Geburtstag hatte und wir wurden von allen sehr lieb und zuvorkommend bedient. Die Burger waren toll und hat einfach geschmeckt. Immer wieder gerne!! 👍🏻👍🏻

(Translated by Google) Very happy and attentive service, appealing and beautiful restaurant and especially one of my best burgers I ever had.

I definitely recommend and I'm looking forward to my next visit.

(Original)
Sehr freudlicher und aufmerksamer Service, Angenhemes und schönes Restaurant und vor allem einer meiner Besten Burger die ich je hatte.

Empfehle ich auf jeden Fall weiter und Freue mich auch schon auf meinen nächsten Besuch.

(Translated by Google) Very classy burger in the city center! There is even a promotional offer to Rucklet Burger! It's worth a try, since you came to Switzerland :)
Very cool burger restaurant in the center of the city! There is even a Raclette Burger promotional offer! Be sure to try, since you came to Switzerland :)

(Original)
Очень классная бургерная в центре города! Есть даже промо-предложение Раклет Бургер! Обязательно стоит попробовать, раз вы приехали в Швейцарию:)
Very cool burger restaurant in the center of the city! There is even a Raclette Burger promotional offer! Be sure to try, since you came to Switzerland :)

(Translated by Google) Very good service and friendly staff. The ambiance is cozy with candles and dimmed lights
Great burgers with lots of toppings and delicious fries.

(Original)
Sehr guter Service und freundliches Personal. Das Ambiente ist gemütlich mit Kerzen und gedimmten Licht
Tolle Burger mit vielen Toppings und leckeren Fries.

(Translated by Google) Unfortunately really not a good burger, the meat was not wearable! But the service was very friendly.

(Original)
Leider wirklich kein guter Burger, das Fleisch war nicht tragbar! Bedienung war aber sehr freundlich.

(Translated by Google) Very friendly staff! The food came very quickly and was super tasty! I can warmly recommend :)

(Translated by Google) Today I tried this new burger shop in Bern. He had to compete against my favorite restaurant for (take-away) burgers, which is a lane further. I ordered an Original Size Bacon & Cheese Burger without tomato slice.

Positive:
- short waiting time until order
- short waiting time until delivery
- The delivered waiting corresponded to my order

Neutral:
- Meat was fried nice pink. For people who do not like cooking levels under medium this can be a problem.
- The herbal limbo has no special USPs, could also be a herbal IceTea from the Migros or Coop.

Negative:
- In the burger pack was on the ground a huge sauces / Fettlake
- The Bun has been soaked by it and was quite snappy
- I only knew the bacon was in the burger because I had seen it. This one had no taste
- The same applies to the cheese as to the bacon. It was an undefined, bright, cheesy mass, almost tasteless.
- The "Butcher's Favroutie Sauce" is also shown by tastelessness
- The fries were probably also kept warm longer, as soft and sloppy as the goods
- As ketchup is the normal Heinz Ketchup.

Price / performance is out of proportion for me. You definitely pay too much for what you have to offer, especially in the takeaway, although there are currently even 20% off. In this quality and quantity is in the Take Away at 20Fr the pain threshold, Reasonable 18Fr.

(Original)
Heute versuchte ich diesen neuen Burgerladen in Bern. Antreten musste er gegen mein Stammlokal für (Take-Away) Burger, welches sich eine Gasse weiter befindet. Bestellt hatte ich einen Original Size Bacon & Cheese Burger ohne Tomatenscheibe.

Positiv:
- kurze Wartezeit bis zur Bestellung
- kurze Wartezeit bis zur Lieferung
- Die gelieferten Warten entsprachen meiner Bestellung

Neutral:
- Fleisch war schön rosa gebraten. Für Personen welche Garstufen unter Medium nicht mögen kann dies ein Problem werden.
- Die Kräuterlimo hat keine speziellen Alleinstellungsmerkmale, könnte auch ein Kräuter IceTea aus der Migros oder Coop sein.

Negativ:
- In der Burgerpackung war am Boden eine riesen Saucen/Fettlake
- Der Bun hat sich dadurch vollgesogen und war ganz schön latschig
- Ich wusste nur das Bacon im Burger war weil ich ihn gesehen hatte. Geschmack hatte dieser keiner
- Für den Cheese gilt dasselbe wie für den Bacon. Es war eine undefinierte, helle, käsige Masse, beinahe ohne geschmack.
- Die "Butcher's Favroutie Sauce" zeigt sich ebenfalls durch geschmacklosigkeit
- Die Pommes waren wohl auch länger warm gehalten, so weich und latschig wie die waren
- Als Ketchup gibts das normale Heinz Ketchup.

Preis/Leistung steht für mich in keinem Verhältnis. Für das Gebotene bezahlt man definitiv zu viel, besonders im Take Away, obwohl es dort aktuell sogar noch 20% Rabatt gibt. Bei dieser Qualität und Menge ist bei mir im Take Away bei 20Fr die Schmerzgrenze, Angemessen 18Fr.

Statt dessen soll man den geschmacklosen Fr... in extra zu bestellende Sösschen tunken, die natürlich noch dazu gekauft werden sollen um noch ein paar Franken mehr zu machen.

Naja und der Abschuss war dann die Dose mit Strohhalm... Really???

Fazit: keine zweite Chance.

So dear Canadian friends: Enjoy some Rösti but keep your hands of Butcher‘s Swiss poutine :)

Was kam war aber nicht nur unappetitlich dank dem Tartar - ähnlichen Fleisch und dessen Aussehen, sondern auch wegen dem Mangel an jeglichen Poutine-Zutaten. So dear Canadian friends: Enjoy some Rösti but keep your hands of Butcher‘s Swiss poutine :)

We had the pulled pork burger
and the beef burger.
The beef burger was quite juicy (a little too juicy for my taste).

Update: March 16, 2017
This time we ordered the falafel burger and the chorizo ​​burger.
I found falafel burgers to be very tasty.
The chorizo ​​burger was extremely juicy (see photo). I almost didn't taste the chorizo.
In addition countrycuts ..... they were great!

Update: 01.02.2018 + 1🌟
This time we ordered the Bacon & Cheese Buger and the Superfood Burger.
Both were delicious. The beef burger no longer juices like last time 😊
Very tasty cheese in the Cheese & Bacon Burger 👍🍔

(Original)
Gute Burger

Freundliches Personal

Wir hatten den pulled pork Burger
und den Rindfleischburger.
Der Rindfleischburger war ziemlich saftig (für mein Geschmack etwas zu Saftig).

Update: 16.03.2017
Diesmal bestellten wir den Falafelburger und den Chorizoburger.
Falafelburger fand ich sehr lecker.
Der Chorizoburger saftete extrem (siehe Foto). Die Chorizo schmeckte ich fast nicht heraus.
Dazu Countrycuts .....die waren Top !!!

Update: 01.02.2018  +1🌟
Diesmal bestellten wir den Bacon & Cheese Buger und den  Superfood Burger.
Beide waren sehr lecker. Der Rindfleischburger saftet auch nicht mehr wie beim letzten mal 😊
Sehr leckerer Käse im Cheese&Bacon Burger 👍🍔
